name: Psychokinefish
description:
Psychokinefish is an auto-scrolling arcade/puzzle game, where the player needs to control objects in the environment using their telekinetic ability tto defeat enemies and bypass obstacles.

The game features 6 levels with each focusing on one core level idea.

Controls:
Use ‘A’ to move left
Use ‘D’ to move right
Use Right Click to take/release control of bubble objects
Use Left Click to use the activated bubble objects

The player can take up to 2 hits from most enemies.

Psychokinefish Team:

Abbey Cameron
Brian Cho
Ximing Yu

Assets Used:

Feast Of Flesh BB Font - Blambot

Underwater Fantasy by Luis Zuno
FOOD free by Sev_4
Bubble popping animation by Robert Brooks
Tower Defense (top-down) Pack by Kenney Vleugels
2D Hodgepodge Pack by Gamertose
Fish Pack by Kenney Vleugels
Fish Sprite by Robert Brooks
Stone and Ice Blocks by Gamertose

Blazer Rail by DL Sounds
Game music, action, urban groove, electro breakbeat with a funky electronic bass and record scratching by ZapSplat
All That by Benjamin Tissot
Kraft Twerk by Alejandro Magaña (A. M.)
Game music – repetitive quiz style music bed, light tension, electronic, passing of time by ZapSplat
Game music – repetitive dark electronic action music bed, lightly dramatic and tense by ZapSplat
